attributes.action: stop ebay forcing sellers to accept paypal and in some cases only paypal. Article 82!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to article 82 ebay should not be allowed to force sellers to accept paypal (which they do even on items that are pick-up only which could easily be abused) and in some catagories to only allow a seller to offer paypal. If a seller offers other methods their listing can be ended.
Also please stop ebay from forcing sellers to offer free post & packing, especially in this hard time and when Royal Mail has just put their prices up!

rejection.details: If you have concerns we suggest you contact the Office of Fair Trading.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
